user.title: Siedle Setup
user.description: You will be redirected to scan the QR code from your Siedle app.

qr_scan.title: Scan QR Code
qr_scan.description:
Please scan the QR code from your Siedle app using your phone's camera.

After scanning, you will be redirected back automatically.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Siedle. Please check the QR code data.
error.invalid_qr: Invalid QR code data. Please try again.
error.unknown: Unknown error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This Siedle device is already configured.

external_sip.title: External SIP Server
external_sip.description:
Configure an external SIP server (e.g., FritzBox, Asterisk) for call forwarding.

Example hosts: fritz.box, asterisk.local, sipgate.de

call_forwarding.title: Call Forwarding
call_forwarding.description:
Configure call forwarding between door station and external phones.

**Forward to number**: Number to call when doorbell rings (e.g., **620 for FritzBox phone)
**Forward from number**: Number that can call the door station

data.forward_from_number: Allow calls from this number to door

recording.title: Recording
recording.description: Configure automatic recording when doorbell rings.

activate_endpoint.name: Activate Endpoint
activate_endpoint.description: Activates/pairs the endpoint with the door station.
